articles.title: Yorkshire racism hearing terrible look - Vaughan
articles.description: Former England captain Michael Vaughan says the disciplinary hearing into allegations of racism at Yorkshire is a "terrible look" for cricket.
articles.content:
Former England captain Michael Vaughan is the only person charged by the ECB to attend the hearing

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
